param.name: google.structured.data
param.desc: Specifies if Google Structured Data used to improve google search results should be generated in the transformation output. If set to yes, the transformation will automatically generate Google Structured Data for Questions and Answers topics, DITA Task topics, and from <data> elements found inside a topic that has the @name="oxy:question" construct. If set to no (default value), the transformation will not generate Google Structured Data.
